products: Sunrise Acute Care for Hospital-based Providers

access.notes: Compliance hub page with accordion sections. EHI Export Documentation is the 6th accordion section. Content is in the DOM (hidden via CSS); no JavaScript rendering needed to extract links. Standard User-Agent header required for downloads.

export_format.description: Five distinct products with different export formats: Altera Lab exports to JSON; dbMotion exports to CSV files; Paragon exports using FHIR R4 resource format; Sunrise and TouchWorks export from SQL Server databases (format is database-native tables). Each product has its own export mechanism and format.

altera_lab.description: PDF with JSON field label map. 3 main record types with child records, ~304 unique JSON field labels.

dbmotion.description: Excel workbook with 19 sheets (Master_Patient, Encounters, Conditions, Medications, Immunizations, Measurements, Labs, Documents, Allergies, Imaging, Procedures, etc). Each sheet has Attribute, Description, Type, Length columns. Accompanied by a 17-page PDF reference guide.

paragon.description: FHIR R4 CapabilityStatement JSON with 48 resource types and 1,425 field-level attributes. Includes custom extension details in separate XLSX. Resources include Account, AllergyIntolerance, Appointment, Claim, Communication, Coverage, Encounter, DocumentReference, and 40 more.

sunrise.description: ER/Studio WebERDiagram export. 4 database schemas documented via interactive HTML framesets with tree navigation. The SCM (main clinical) database alone has 2,728 tables. Tables are prefixed 'dbo.CV3' and 'dbo.SXAAM' etc.

touchworks.description: HTML documentation site with tree navigation. 8 databases, 556 total tables. The Works database (521 tables) is the main clinical database with detailed table names, descriptions, and column-level documentation. Each table has descriptions explaining its purpose.

clinical.evidence: Extensive clinical data across all products. TouchWorks: Problem, Medication, Allergy, Immunization, Finding, Result, Goal tables. Sunrise: CV3Allergen, CV3BasicObservation, CV3CareProvider, thousands of clinical tables. Paragon: AllergyIntolerance, Condition, MedicationRequest, Observation, Procedure FHIR resources. Altera Lab: Patient, Encounters, Enterprise Order JSON records. dbMotion: Conditions, Medications, Immunizations, Labs, Procedures sheets.

secure_messages.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Direct_Message_Type_DE (Direct Message Types), dbo.Patient_Correspondence (Patient correspondence data), dbo.Patient_Communication_DE, dbo.Note_Type_DE includes 'Message' type, dbo.PatientCommunication (portal/communication preferences). Paragon: Communication and CommunicationRequest FHIR resources. Sunrise: CV3CommunicationProcess, CV3CommunicationType, CV3CustomMessages tables.

billing_financial.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Charge (Patient Charge Data), dbo.Charge_Code_DE, dbo.Charge_Diagnosis, dbo.Charge_Modifier, dbo.Charge_Status, dbo.Order_Item_Charge, dbo.NAW_ChargeList, dbo.Billing_Area_DE, dbo.Billing_Location_DE, dbo.When_To_Charge_DE. AHSCharge separate database for charge data. Paragon: ChargeItem, Claim, PaymentNotice, PaymentReconciliation FHIR resources. Sunrise: SXAAMBSBillChargeDetail, SXAAMBSBillChargeHeader, SXAAMPaymentMethod, SXAAMFacilityBillingEdits. Altera Lab: OE - INS CARRIER, OE - BILL TYPE, OE - BILL LEVEL fields.

insurance_coverage.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Primary_Insurance (Current Registration Insurance), dbo.Visit_Insurance, dbo.Encounter_Insurance, dbo.Insurance_Class_DE, dbo.Patient_PBM (Rx Benefit plan), dbo.Benefit_Category_DE. Paragon: Coverage, CoverageEligibilityRequest, CoverageEligibilityResponse FHIR resources. Sunrise: CV3Eligibility, SXAAMInsuranceCarrier, SXAAMInsuranceType, SXAAMVisitInsuranceEffectiveTimeSpan, SXAEDIInsuranceAuthorizationContact.

appointments_scheduling.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Appointment (Patient Appointments, Past, Present and Future), dbo.Appoint_Segment, dbo.Appointment_Address, dbo.Appointment_Status_DE, dbo.Appointment_Type_DE, dbo.Resource_DE (Schedulable resource), dbo.Location_DE (Scheduling Location). Paragon: Appointment, AppointmentResponse FHIR resources. Sunrise: CV3CollSchedule, CV3CollScheduleDtl, CV3FixedScheduleDefinition.

documents_images.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Document (versioned storage for clinical notes, reminders, etc.), dbo.Document_Annotation, dbo.Document_Type_de, dbo.DOCWORKS_Signature, dbo.NoteForm_NAW_Instance (v11 note body), dbo.Inbound_Document, dbo.Person_Picture (Patient Picture), dbo.Result_External_Storage (Image results to external storage). Paragon: DocumentReference, Media, ImagingStudy FHIR resources. Sunrise: CV3ClientDocumentARC, CV3ClientDocumentCUR, CV3DocumentBrowseItem, CV3DocumentSource. dbMotion: Documents sheet, Imaging sheet.

audit_trails.evidence: TouchWorks: dbo.Audit_Log (Audit Log of user and system actions), dbo.Audit_ChartView_DiscInfo (Audit of Chart view disclosures and Download Chart), dbo.PatientAccessLog (Audit of patients brought into context), dbo.PatientPortalUserActivity (Audit of portal/FHIR activity), dbo.NoteForm_NAW_Audit (v11 Note Audit log), dbo.Encounter_Audit, dbo.Patient_Community_Audit, dbo.PatientCommunication_Audit. Sunrise: SXAEISAuditLogRecord, SXAGNAuditableEvent, SXAMMAuditField.

developer_guide_notes: dbMotion includes a 17-page EHI Export Reference Guide PDF covering the export UI and process. TouchWorks and Sunrise ZIPs include interactive HTML documentation with tree navigation. Paragon provides FHIR CapabilityStatement with hyperlinks to field definitions.

issues: Multiple products with different documentation formats makes unified analysis challenging
Paragon uses FHIR CapabilityStatement format â€” closer to FHIR API documentation than raw database schema, raising question of whether export is FHIR-based or database-native
Altera Lab documentation is relatively thin (single PDF, ~304 fields across 3 sections) compared to TouchWorks (556 tables) and Sunrise (2,728 tables)
No documentation found specifically for 'Integrated Providers Patient Portal' product listed in CHPL
Some download URLs lack file extensions, relying on content-disposition headers
Sunrise documentation uses legacy HTML framesets (frameset/frame elements) that may not render well in modern browsers
summary: Altera Digital Health provides comprehensive EHI export documentation for 5 product lines from a single compliance hub page. Coverage varies dramatically by product: Sunrise documents 2,728 database tables via ER/Studio HTML exports; TouchWorks documents 556 tables across 8 databases with detailed descriptions; Paragon maps to 48 FHIR resource types with 1,425 fields; dbMotion covers 19 data categories in an Excel workbook; and Altera Lab provides a PDF documenting ~304 JSON field labels. All products provide field-level detail. The documentation represents genuine database-native schemas (not just FHIR re-exports) for Sunrise, TouchWorks, dbMotion, and Altera Lab, with broad coverage of clinical, billing, insurance, appointments, documents, messaging, and audit data.
